author: potuz
content:
It's somewhat not so complicated to address though, in principle in this situation we can just keep the payload as canonical and charge the builder, the problem is that it either 
1) involves the EL or
2) It complicates forkchoice even more

1) would be an approach in which we allow the blockhash to actually be there in the canonical chain with an empty state transition. So the block is actually canonical with invalid execution. 
2) we need to keep the data for the payload on the nodes (since you need to prove onchain that you have something invalid) but this data is non-canonical from the point of view of execution.
